metadata: I am a software engineer who loves to develop mobile applications
intro:
## Hello, I'm a mobile developer Sejun Lim!
  - Hello, I'm Lim Sejun, a mobile developer who started with Android and now has a lot of interest in the Flutter framework.

- I am developing with value in the knowledge and rewards of solving problems together.
career:
# Sejun2 change log

All notable changes will be recorded in this file.

## Freecap

2023.08 ~ 

 Developed and maintained a flutter-based **blockchain/social community app service**

- Null-safety migration
1. flutter & dart sdk upgrade
2. Update and migrate packages that no longer support None-null-safety
3. Correction of related errors
- Refactoring to a Clean Architecture with MVVM structure
1. Domain - Data - Presentation
- Improve routing and deep link structure with GoRouter packages
- DI application for refactoring and switching to testable code
Infuse external dependencies with Injectable packages
- Create a Unit test
Create a unit test for domain, data, and presentation areas while refactoring with a clean architecture structure
-  CI/CD 적용 with Github Action
Building CI/CD Pipeline Using Fastlane on Hostpc for Build with Githubaction Hook
- migration to health management serverpod
Migrate uncomfortable health management to the serverpad package because it is managed as a setState
- Maintenance
1. Development of various Interactive UIs
2. Improve service stability
Reduced API call due to caching
Improving logic of non-logical structures
Solving a variety of other issues
3. Development of the Express-based Nodejs Web Server API

---

## Zero X-Flow

2022.04 ~ 2023.1

The 1hour app is an English education app that helps teachers and students with various functions such as word study, voice and video recording, and wordbook games.

job description
